name: fake-out
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Causes the target to flinch.  Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that hits
first and causes
flinching. Usable
only on 1st turn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An attack that hits
first and makes the
target flinch.
This move works only
on the first turn.
